Functions

DIRTYCODE_API WebOfferT * WebOfferCreate (char *pBuffer, int32_t iLength)
 Create a new web-offer module instance using passed in memory. Note that caller must make sure the buffer is valid until WebOfferDestroy is called. Recommand buffer is at least WEBOFFER_SUGGESTED_MEM bytes (based on typical usage). More...
 
DIRTYCODE_API WebOfferT * WebOfferDestroy (WebOfferT *pOffer)
 Destroy the web-offer module. More...

 Do period update – called by HttpResult automaticallt so most applications don't need to call direct. More...

#define WEBOFFER_CREDIT_NUMBUTTONS   (4)

number of credit buttons

Referenced by WebOfferGetCredit().

#define WEBOFFER_DispToMemSize (   nDispChars)    ((nDispChars * 100) / 50)

Games that support Greek and/or Asian languages encode each user-visible character using UTF-8 which results in a single character being represented by 1-4 bytes. These games therefore need larger buffers to hold strings.

The following macro is used to convert the suggested display length to a storage size. If space is at a premium and the game is English only, the calculation can be reduced to simply equate the two sizes. Otherwise, this formula should be adjusted to take into account the average display size and average storage size of the strings to be used.

number of auxillary pictures allowed for a web offer form screen

Function Documentation

DIRTYCODE_API void WebOfferAction ( WebOfferT *  pOffer,
int32_t  iAction 
)

Report user input from last command.

Parameters
*pOffer- module state from WebOfferCreate
iAction- action

DIRTYCODE_API WebOfferT* WebOfferCreate ( char *  pBuffer,
int32_t  iLength 
)

Create a new web-offer module instance using passed in memory. Note that caller must make sure the buffer is valid until WebOfferDestroy is called. Recommand buffer is at least WEBOFFER_SUGGESTED_MEM bytes (based on typical usage).

Parameters
*pBuffer- pointer to caller supplied buffer, or NULL
iLength- length of caller supplied buffer, or size of buffer to allocate if pBuffer==NULL
Returns
WebOfferT reference pointer – pass as input to all other functions
Version
03/13/2004 gschaefer

References DirtyMemAlloc(), DirtyMemFree(), DirtyMemGroupQuery(), ProtoHttpCreate(), WebOfferT::pScript, ST_IDLE, WEBOFFER_MEMID, and WebOfferDestroy().
